songs.title: All You Need Is Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Liam & Harry]
There's nothing you can do that can't be done
There's nothing you can sing that can't be sung
There's nothing you can say, but you can learn how to play the game
It's easy
Oh, there's nothing you can make that can't be made
There's no one you can save that can't be saved
There's nothing you can do, but you can learn how to be you in time
It's easy, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Chorus: All]
All you need is love, all you need is love
All you need is love, love, love is all you need

[Verse 2: Niall & (All) & Harry]
(Love, love, love, love)
There's nothing you can know that isn't known (Love, love, love, love)
(Love, love, love, love)
There's nothing you can see that isn't shown (Love, love, love, love)
There's nowhere you can be that isn't where you're meant to be
It's easy yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Chorus: All]
All you need is love, all you need is love
All you need is love, love, love is all you need

[Bridge: (All) & Harry]
(Love, love, love, love)
Love is all you need
(Love, love, love, love)
Love is all you need
(Love, love, love, love)
Love is all you need
(Love, love, love, love)
Come on!

[Chorus: All & (Harry)]
All you need is love, all you need is love (Oh!)
All you need is love, love, love is all you need

[End: All & (Harry)]
Love is all you need
Love is all you need (Yeah!)
Love is all you need
Love is all you need
Love is all you need
(Love is all you need)
